title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 15 December 2015 - XWiki
content:
<tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
04:59 <sorinello> has quit  
05:11 <sorinello> has joined #xwiki  
05:11 <sorinello> has joined #xwiki

08:06 <abusenius\_> has quit

08:45 <vmassol> has quit  
08:45 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:07 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
10:06 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:06 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:19 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:03 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:04 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:29 <Panther\_1> has joined #xwiki  
11:29 <Panther\_1> hi  
11:29 <Panther\_1> who should I contact If i have found a serious security problem in xwiki 6.4.6?  
11:38 <Panther\_1> please take a look inside: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12910  
11:38 <Panther\_1> xwikibot: wrong I created it two miutes before <-- bad bot  
11:39 <vmassol> Panther\_1: hi  
11:39 <vmassol> there's a list you can send to for security matters  
11:39 <vmassol> see http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/MailingLists#HPrivateMailingLists  
11:41 <Panther\_1> vmassol: can I send withozut subscribed?  
11:41 <Panther\_1> vmassol: I can access /etc/passwd on xwiki.org ...  
12:11 <gdelhumeau> mflorea: What is your status about XWIKI-12838, XWIKI-12762 and XWIKI-12757?  
12:11 <gdelhumeau> mflorea: I see there is no commit, maybe we should move these issues to RC1?  
12:12 <gdelhumeau> Enygma`: You have some commits for XWIKI-12775, did you need more time to finish?  
12:13 <Enygma`> gdelhumeau: no, I was waiting for validation that the tests are fixed  
12:13 <Enygma`> will close it now  
12:13 <Panther\_1> gdelhumeau: please see priv message  
12:13 <gdelhumeau> FYI I have restarted tests for xe-tests-selenium  
12:14 <gdelhumeau> I've seen it Panther\_1, and it is weird  
12:14 <Panther\_1> gdelhumeau: ist on all xwiki installations I found on the web  
12:14 <Panther\_1> gdelhumeau: I also could retrieve the ssl private key from xwiki,org  
12:18 <mflorea> gdelhumeau: I moved them  
12:23 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: you are not assigned but I think you are the people interested in XWIKI-12271?  
12:23 <gdelhumeau> I think it could go to rc1 too  
12:55 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
12:58 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: thanks, I've moved it to 8.0. Right now I don't master the consequences but the VFS module doesn't seem impacted  
13:14 <gdelhumeau> restart xwiki.org in 5min  
13:19 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
14:30 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
14:45 <martinus\_\_> has quit  
14:49 <martinus\_\_> has joined #xwiki  
15:00 <msmeria> has quit  
15:28 <Ramona1> has quit  
16:01 <mflorea> has quit  
16:39 <ClemensR> The Attachment macro at http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Attachments+Macro has no git repo or bugtracker, it seems, so if I have a bug to fix I just update the attached xar, right?  
16:44 <gdelhumeau> vmassol, Enygma`: missing documentation: http://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?jql=Project%20in%20%28%22XWiki%20Commons%22%2C%20%22XWiki%20Rendering%22%2C%20%22XWiki%20Platform%22%2C%20%22XWiki%20Enterprise%22%29%20and%20fixVersion%20in%20%28%227.4-milestone-2%22%29%20and%20resolution%20in%20%28%22Fixed%22%29%20and%20%28%28Documentation%20is%20EMPTY%29%20or%20%28%22Documentation%20in%20Release%20Notes%22%20is%20EMPTY%29%29  
16:46 <gdelhumeau> same for Marius if someone can tell him  
16:46 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: yes i know, I need to find 30mn to write this doc… doing it now  
16:56 <Enygma`> gdelhumeau: yes, will do it soon
